mapper.select: select h.house_id HOUSE_ID, h.house_code HOUSE_CODE, h.house_nature HOUSE_NATURE, h.use_area USE_AREA, h.bsflag BSFLAG, b.building_id buildId from oil_house_information h left join building_info b on h.building_id = b.lake_building_id
